topic.title: Footnotes

fn.p: In September 2007 the IASB amended the title of IAS 7 from Cash Flow Statements to Statement of Cash Flows as a consequence of the revision of IAS 1 Presentation of Financial Statements in 2007.
The entity did not recognise any components of other comprehensive income in the period ended 20X2
This could also be shown as an operating cash flow.
